'''Flaming Red Bolognese''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Flaming Red Bolognese is obtainable from [[Good Hunter]] for 2,500 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20.

Depending on the quality, Flaming Red Bolognese restores '''18'''/'''20'''/'''22'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''300'''/'''390'''/'''470''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Lisa|Mysterious Bolognese}}
